post.text:
For respect.
For the future.
For our planet.

On Tuesday, they're gonna hear us roar: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: James
comment.text: Trump supporters support the molesting of little children and make excuses for pedophiles like Trump who has been labeled the biggest liar in the presidential nominee history by a pulitzer prize winning fact checker. ... He is going to court in November for fraud and racketeering for his fake scam Trump University and again in December for raping 13 year old little girl! He and his supporters have made us the laughing stock of the world and are an embarrassment to our country!

replies.author: James
replies.text: Rated biggest liar in Presidential nominee history by Pulitzer prize-winning fact checker politifact.com

replies.text: Not before him she hasn't done anything illegal to go to jail she was cleared by the FBI get a clue stop drinking the Kool-Aid
